questions.question_text: "retention" の意味はどれでしょう？
questions.example_sentence: The revised policy aims to improve employee retention by offering more career options.
questions.explanation:
定着・保持
コスト削減
評価
市場拡大

questions.question_text: "visibility" の意味はどれでしょう？
choices_text: The ability to see or access information clearly
questions.example_sentence: The policy provides employees with greater visibility into internal job openings.
questions.explanation:
見える状態・可視性
承認手続き
責任軽減
一時的配置

questions.question_text: "coordinate" の意味はどれでしょう？
choices_text: To organize actions smoothly with others
questions.example_sentence: Managers will coordinate the transition plan once a candidate is selected.
questions.explanation:
調整する
中止する
延期する
評価する

questions.question_text: "qualifications" の意味はどれでしょう？
choices_text: Skills or experience required for a role
questions.example_sentence: Transfers depend on business needs and the applicant’s qualifications.
questions.explanation:
資格・適性
社内規定
研修
福利厚生

questions.question_text: "alignment" の意味はどれでしょう？
questions.example_sentence: Employees should ensure alignment between career goals and company priorities.
questions.explanation:
一致・整合
対立
財務調整
組織再編
